Templates.name: sap.fe.core.actions.draft.activateDocument
Templates.helpDescription:
Creates an active document from a draft document

The function supports several hooks as there is a certain coreography defined

Templates.name: sap.fe.core.actions.draft.createDraftFromActiveDocument
Templates.helpDescription:
Creates a draft document from an existing document

The function supports several hooks as there is a certain coreography defined

Templates.template:
callActionImport(
	"${sActionName}", // string
	"${oModel}", // sap.ui.model.odata.v4.ODataModel
	{
		actionParameters: ${actionParameters}, // map
		label: "${label}", // string
		showActionParameterDialog: ${bShowActionParameterDialog}, // boolean
		onSubmitted: ${fn_onSubmitted}, // function
		defaultParameters: ${defaultParameters} // map
	}
)
Templates.name: sap.fe.core.actions.operations.callActionImport

Templates.template:
callBoundAction(
	"${sActionName}", // string
	"${contexts}", // sap.ui.model.odata.v4.Context
	{
		actionParameters: ${actionParameters}, // map
		mBindingParameters: ${mBindingParameters}, // map
		additionalSideEffect: [${additionalSideEffect}], // array
		showActionParameterDialog: ${bShowActionParameterDialog}, // boolean
		label: "${label}", // string
		invocationGrouping: "${invocationGrouping}", // string
		onSubmitted: ${fn_onSubmitted}, // function
		defaultParameters: ${defaultParameters}, // map
		parentControl: ${parentControl} // sap.ui.core.Element
	}
)
Templates.name: sap.fe.core.actions.operations.callBoundAction
Templates.helpDescription: Calls a bound action for one or multiple contexts

Templates.helpDescription: Creates and navigates a message page to show an error

Templates.template:
navigate(
	"${sSemanticObject}", // string
	"${sActionName}", // string
	"${vNavigationParameters}", // object|string
	{
		selectionVariant: "${selectionVariant}", // string
		tableVariantId: "${tableVariantId}", // string
		customData: ${customData}, // object
		presentationVariant: ${presentationVariant}, // object
		valueTexts: ${valueTexts} // object
	},
	"${fnOnError}", // function
	{
		presentationVariant: ${presentationVariant}, // object
		valueTexts: ${valueTexts}, // object
		selectionVariant: ${selectionVariant} // object
	},
	"${sNavMode}" // string
)
Templates.name: sap.ui.generic.app.navigation.service.NavigationHandler.navigate
Templates.description: navigate(sSemanticObject, sActionName, vNavigationParameters?, oInnerAppData?, fnOnError?, oExternalAppData, sNavMode?)
Templates.helpDescription: Triggers a cross-app navigation after saving the inner and the cross-app states. Since 1.52.0 the navigation mode based on sap-ushell-next-navmode is taken into account. If set to explace the inner app state will not be changed. Note: The sNavMode argument can be used to overwrite the SAP Fiori launchpad default navigation for opening a URL in-place or ex-place.

Templates.name: sap.ui.generic.app.navigation.service.NavigationHandler.processBeforeSmartLinkPopoverOpens
Templates.helpDescription:
Processes navigation-related tasks related to beforePopoverOpens event handling for the SmartLink control and returns a Promise object. In particular, the following tasks are performed before the SmartLink popover can be opened:
  • If mInnerAppData is provided, this inner app state is saved for back navigation at a later time.
  • The table event parameters (semantic attributes) and the selection variant data are combined by calling the method {@link #.mixAttributesAndSelectionVariant mixAttributesAndSelectionVariant}.
  • The combined data is saved as the cross app state to be handed over to the target app, and the corresponding sap-xapp-state key is set in the URL.
  • All single selections ("including equal") of the combined selection data are passed to the SmartLink popover as semantic attributes.
  • The method oTableEventParameters.open() is called. Note that this does not really open the popover, but the SmartLink control proceeds with firing the event navigationTargetsObtained.

Templates.name: sap.ui.generic.app.navigation.service.NavigationHandler.storeInnerAppState
Templates.helpDescription: Changes the URL according to the current app state and stores the app state for later retrieval.

Templates.name: sap.ui.generic.app.navigation.service.NavigationHandler.storeInnerAppStateWithImmediateReturn
Templates.helpDescription: Changes the URL according to the current app state and stores the app state for later retrieval.
